description: This React component renders the details of a game room, including room information, join functionality, chat panel, and real-time WebSocket communication. It manages state for loading room data, user interactions, and socket connection lifecycle.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches room details from API and updates state; invoked on component mount or roomId change.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Attempts to join the room via API, then navigates to game route or shows error.

methods.name: sendChat
methods.description: Sends chat message over WebSocket connection.
